price: (5) Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."
arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ajaʿala al-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidan inna hādhā lashayon ʿujābun
